detail_desc: Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband at the back with wide, crossover straps and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband at the back with wide, crossover straps and a high cut at the back.
Metal necklace decorated with plastic beads and leaf-shaped metal pendants. Adjustable length 46-53 cm.
Trainers with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Trainers with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton pointelle jersey with a V-neck and button placket. Decorative picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, textured swimsuit with a cut-out section and decorative bow at the top.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads in various sizes and colours. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
One thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant and one necklace decorated with semi-precious stones and plastic beads. Adjustable length 54–61 cm and 42–50 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with gathers for added width. Unlined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with gathers for added width. Unlined.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Jumpsuit in textured, double-weave organic cotton. Wide shoulder straps, buttons at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist. Straight, ankle-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups. Lined at the top.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a straight hem.

Boxy, oversized jacket in a wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front, large chest pockets with a flap and button, and a pair of front pockets concealed by the chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a bleached pattern. High waist with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back of the waistband, a zip fly with buttons, and tapered legs.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, a gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Wide fit with a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, a gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Wide fit with a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Glittery, fabric-covered Alice band with different-coloured flowers on top and tulle at the ends. Matching wand with a glittery, padded butterfly and satin ribbons at the top.
Calf-length dress in lace with a V-neck front and back, seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Partly lined.
Dog jumper in a soft, fine, patterned knit containing some wool with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and openings for the back legs.
Small, round shoulder bag in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a glittery heart on the front, a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 4x13 cm.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft and soft terry inside. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Small, two-section bag in grained imitation leather with zips and a magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 4.5x9x17 cm.
Small, two-section bag in grained imitation leather with zips and a magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 4.5x9x17 cm.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Flared blouse in double-weave organic cotton with embroidery at the top. Round neckline, a yoke at the top, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and buttons down the back.
Pool shoes in lightly padded imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and fluted soles. Sizes 7-9 also have a heel strap.
Pool shoes in lightly padded imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and fluted soles. Sizes 7-9 also have a heel strap.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in superstretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and wide, flared legs.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in superstretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and wide, flared legs.

Turban in a soft rib knit.
Turban in a soft rib knit.
Turban in a soft rib knit.

Crinkled blouse in a jacquard weave with a unique nursing feature, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Playsuit in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and flutter sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and pockets in the side seams.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Fancy dress costume with a cape and hat in jersey and a magic wand. Cape with a lightly padded collar and hook and loop fastening at the neck. Lightly padded hat with a contrasting colour band. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Nursing shirt in a cotton weave with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and a concealed zip in each side for easier nursing access. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with scalloped trims at the cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with scalloped trims at the cuffs. Lined.
Small, heart-shaped bag in rattan with a handle at the top and a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap. Tab and metal fastener at the top. Lined. Size approx. 8x18x20 cm.
Waist bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Size approx. 5x13x20 cm.
Skirt in checked twill containing glittery threads with elastication at the back of the waist and a double layer of asymmetric flounces at the hem. Unlined.
Loafers in a textured weave with a heart-shaped buckle at one side in metal decorated with sparkly stones. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a small frill around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocking across the chest, a seam below the bust and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Trainers in a textured weave with crocodile-patterned and shimmering metallic imitation leather details, a padded edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, glittery cotton jersey with a gathered seam and small frill trim at the waist, and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
